00017 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 
00037 MTKt_status MtkLSToSomXYAry(
00038   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo, 
00039   int nelement,         
00040   const float *line,    
00041   const float *sample,  
00042   double *som_x,        
00043   double *som_y          ) {
00044 
00045   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00046   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Error return status code */
00047   int i;                        /* Loop index */
00048 
00049   if (line == NULL || sample == NULL || som_x == NULL || som_y == NULL)
00050     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00051 
00052   if (nelement < 0)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00054 
00055   /* This routine will processing all elements in the input arrays */
00056   /* no matter if an error occurred in any of the elements. */
00057   /* An unsuccessful error code will be return only if one of the */
00058   /* elements encountered an error.  If none do then the status is */
00059   /* success. */
00060 
00061   status_code = MTK_SUCCESS;
00062 
00063   for (i = 0; i < nelement; i++) {
00064     status = MtkLSToSomXY(mapinfo, line[i], sample[i], &som_x[i], &som_y[i]);
00065     if (status) status_code = status;
00066   }
00067 
00068   return status_code;
00069 
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   return status_code;
00072 }
